com.github.restdriver.clientdriver

Class ClientDriverRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.restdriver.clientdriver.ClientDriverRequest

  • public final class ClientDriverRequest
extends Object
    Class for encapsulating an HTTP request.
